1327950.name: Future Fragments Soundtrack
1327950.description:
90% of all sales of the soundtrack will go to Wishful Simping, so if you want to support his hard work, buy this soundtrack!

This soundtrack features 161 songs for our 18+ adult action-adventure game, Future Fragments.

There's not much we could say about it that wouldn't be demonstrated by the music itself, so we'll just let you get to listening to it!
